mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY-MM') AS orderdate, SUM(o.pamount * p.price) AS totalPrice FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN product p ON o.pnum = p.pnum GROUP BY TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY orderdate

SELECT SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '01', 1, 0)) AS "1월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '02', 1, 0)) AS "2월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '03', 1, 0)) AS "3월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '04', 1, 0)) AS "4월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '05', 1, 0)) AS "5월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '06', 1, 0)) AS "6월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '07', 1, 0)) AS "7월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '08', 1, 0)) AS "8월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '09', 1, 0)) AS "9월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '10', 1, 0)) AS "10월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '11', 1, 0)) AS "11월_주문수", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '12', 1, 0)) AS "12월_주문수" FROM orderInfo GROUP BY TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY')
